## QA Checklist
*To be filled out by QA only*

**Browsers:**
*To be tested on a desktop computer*
- [ ] Chrome
- [ ] Firefox
- [ ] Microsoft Edge
- [ ] Safari

**Mobile:**
*To be tested on a mobile device*
- [ ] Android Chrome (portrait)
- [ ] iOS Safari (portrait)

**Views:**
*To be tested on a desktop computer on the browser of choice*
- [ ] iPad (1024x768)
- [ ] 1080p (1920x1080)
- [ ] 1600x900
- [ ] 1366x768
